title: Al-Jarushiya
text:
al-Jarushiya () is a <a href="Palestinian%20people">Palestinian</a> village in the <a href="Tulkarm%20Governorate">Tulkarm Governorate</a> in the western <a href="West%20Bank">West Bank</a>, located 6 kilometers North of <a href="Tulkarm">Tulkarm</a>. According to the <a href="Palestinian%20Central%20Bureau%20of%20Statistics">Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics</a>, al Jarushiya had a population of approximately 907 inhabitants in mid-year 2006. 8.4% of the population of al-Jarushiya were refugees in 1997. The healthcare facilities for the surrounding villages are based in al-Jarushiya, the facilities are designated as MOH level 2.
History.
In 1961, under <a href="Jordan">Jordan</a>ian rule, the population of "Jarushiya" was 245.
Post 1967.
After the <a href="Six-Day%20War">Six-Day War</a> in 1967, Al-Jarushiya came under <a href="Israeli%20occupation%20of%20the%20West%20Bank">Israeli occupation</a>.
